name: Squishy Sharks
description:
Can you stop the sharks from eating the scuba divers? Use your finger to squish the sharks as they swim around. Be careful, scuba divers can be squished too. If you squish a diver, he or she says a witty remark and you lose strength. If a shark eats a diver you lose strength. If a shark swims off the screen you lose strength. If you run out of strength, you lose the game! If you squish the number of sharks required, you win that level. Complete all the levels and win the game!

5 Game Levels + 4 Skill levels = 20 levels of fun!

Squishy Sharks is fun for the whole family!

"I can see why Squishy Sharks is quickly becoming a global craze! It's fun and addictive" - JG

How many sharks can you squish?

You have to play to find out!

* If you like this app, please write a review and help spread the word by sharing this app with your friends and share on Facebook and Twitter. Thank you.

** If you have ideas on how to make this app better, or if you are experiencing technical problems with this app, please don't write a review, but instead contact us by pressing the "App Support" button located in the Information screen.
